item.title: DigitalOcean MCP Server is now available
item.description: ð The new DigitalOcean MCP Server is here! This tool allows developers to manage cloud resources using natural language commands through AI tools like Cursor and Claude. It connects to 9 services, streamlining operations. ð¨âð» With simple commands, you can deploy apps, manage databases, and optimize costsâall without extensive scripting. ð Get started by following the configuration guidelines on GitHub. #DigitalOcean #CloudManagement #AI #MCP #TechInnovation

item.title: Stop Building SaaS from Scratch: Meet the SeaNotes Starter Kit
item.description: ð Introducing SeaNotes, a SaaS Starter Kit by DigitalOcean! Designed for indie hackers and developers, it offers a ready-to-use framework for building SaaS applications quickly. With built-in features like user authentication, Stripe billing, and AI integrations, you can focus on your product instead of setup. ð Check it out on GitHub and start building with best practices in mind! #SaaS #DigitalOcean #SeaNotes #OpenSource #DevTools

item.title: Announcing OpenAI gpt-oss Models on the DigitalOcean Gradientâ¢ AI Platform
item.description: ð OpenAI has launched its first open-source GPT models (20b and 120b) on the Gradient AI Platform! These models offer flexibility for developers to create AI applications, from prototypes to production agents. Users can access them through the Serverless Inference API or the Gradient dashboard. With integrated billing and monitoring features, building AI apps is now simpler than ever. Get started today! ð #OpenAI #GradientAI #AIDevelopment #TechNews #MachineLearning

item.title: Introducing langchain-gradient: Seamless LangChain Integration with DigitalOcean Gradientâ¢ AI Platform
item.description: ð Exciting news! We’ve launched langchain-gradient, an open-source integration connecting LangChain to the DigitalOcean Gradient AI Platform. This innovative package simplifies the development of AI applications with tools for chaining prompts and managing data. Key features include: - Seamless integration for quick deployment. - Access to multiple AI models with GPU-accelerated performance. - Full open-source compatibility. Use cases range from chatbots to automated workflows, enhancing…

item.title: Build smarter AI agents: new tools now available for the DigitalOcean Gradientâ¢ AI Platform
item.description: ð Exciting updates are here for the Gradient AI Platform! The new tools enable faster and easier AI app development. Key features include: - Unified Gradient AI Python SDK: Access all major services in one place. - Log Stream Insights: Real-time analysis improves agent performance. - Dropbox Data Connector: Ingest knowledge directly from Dropbox. These enhancements support building production-ready AI applications efficiently. #AI #GradientAI #PythonSDK #TechUpdates #Innovation

item.title: Introducing GPU Droplets accelerated by NVIDIA HGX H200
item.description: ð Exciting news for AI developers! DigitalOcean has launched NVIDIA HGX H200 GPU Droplets, offering up to 2x faster inference speeds and double the memory capacity compared to the H100. These droplets are designed for simplicity and scalability, priced at just $3.44/GPU/hr. With 141 GB of memory and HBM3e technology, they enhance performance for demanding tasks in AI and HPC. All droplets are HIPAA-eligible and SOC 2 compliant, ensuring security. Start accelerating your AI projects today!…

item.title: Sharks of DigitalOcean: Darian Wilkin, Senior Manager, Solutions Engineering
item.description: Meet Darian Wilkin, Senior Manager of Solutions Engineering at DigitalOcean, who has been with the company for over eight years. He has witnessed its evolution from a startup to a public company. ð Darian emphasizes the importance of a supportive culture and talented team, which enhances collaboration and keeps him motivated. He plays a key role in helping customers build efficient cloud solutions. âï¸ He values the quick decision-making process at DigitalOcean, allowing ideas to turn into…

item.title: Now Live: GPT-5 on the DigitalOcean Gradient™ AI Platform
item.description: 🚀 Exciting news! GPT-5 is now live on the DigitalOcean Gradient™ AI Platform. Developers can access this advanced model via serverless inference APIs or the Gradient AI Platform SDK. You can also use your own OpenAI API key for integration. GPT-5 enhances reasoning and performance, making it ideal for tasks like financial planning, medical analysis, and creative content generation. Get started today! 🌟 #GPT5 #DigitalOcean #AIPlatform #Developers #OpenAI
